Description: Foot sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery stemless cup, with turn to body; black slip (partly misfired red); outer face and resting surface worn, the former with glaze traces; inscription incised on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 508)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1512)
